 To apply for admission into the West Coast TVET College WCC Application Form 2024, kindly follow the link and apply online. All applications must be submitted online.

West Coast TVET College

West Coast TVET College is a public Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) college located in the Western Cape province of South Africa. The college offers a variety of vocational training programs and courses in fields such as engineering, business studies, hospitality, tourism, and more.

Some of the campuses of West Coast TVET College include:

  1. Atlantis Campus
  2. Citrusdal Campus
  3. Malmesbury Campus
  4. Vredenburg Campus
  5. Vredendal Campus

The college is committed to providing quality education and training to equip students with the necessary skills to succeed in the workforce. Students at West Coast TVET College can expect to receive practical, hands-on training in their chosen field of study.

What to Know About the West Coast TVET College Application Form Portal

The West Coast TVET College WCC Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the WCC application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to WCC on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

How to Apply | WCC Application Form 2024

Follow the steps below

  • Visit Application portal: http://www.westcoastcollege.co.za/
  • Choose type of Application (Undergraduate, Post Graduate, Semester Studies)
  • Fill and complete all necessary pages
  • Pay Application fees where required

 

West Coast TVET College Application Required Documents

To apply to WCC you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript

For more information regarding the application for admission into the West Coast TVET College, kindly drop your messages in the comment box below.

West Coast TVET College Courses

West Coast TVET College offers a variety of courses in different fields of study. Here are some of the courses that are currently offered at the college:
  1. Engineering Studies:
  • Electrical Engineering N1-N6
  • Mechanical Engineering N1-N6
  • Civil Engineering N1-N6
  • Building and Civil Construction N1-N6
  1. Business Studies:
  • Financial Management N4-N6
  • Management Assistant N4-N6
  • Marketing Management N4-N6
  • Human Resource Management N4-N6
  1. Hospitality and Tourism:
  • Hospitality and Catering Services N4-N6
  • Tourism N4-N6
  1. Information and Communication Technology:
  • Information Technology and Computer Science N4-N6
  1. Safety in Society:
  • Policing N4-N6
  1. Primary Health Care:
  • Community Health Work NQF Level 4
  1. Education and Training:
  • Educare N4-N6

FAQ About West Coast TVET College

Here are some frequently asked questions about West Coast TVET College:

What is West Coast TVET College?

West Coast TVET College is a public Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) college located in the Western Cape province of South Africa. The college offers a variety of vocational training programs and courses in fields such as engineering, business studies, hospitality, tourism, and more.

What are the campuses of West Coast TVET College?

The campuses of West Coast TVET College include Atlantis, Citrusdal, Malmesbury, Vredenburg, and Vredendal.

What programs and courses are offered by West Coast TVET College?

West Coast TVET College offers a wide range of programs and courses in areas such as engineering, business studies, hospitality, tourism, information technology, and more. Some of the specific programs offered include electrical engineering, mechanical engineering, financial management, hospitality and catering services, and tourism.

What are the admission requirements for West Coast TVET College?

The admission requirements for West Coast TVET College may vary depending on the program or course you are interested in. Generally, applicants must have a National Senior Certificate (NSC) or equivalent qualification, and meet any additional requirements specific to their chosen program.

How do I apply to West Coast TVET College?

To apply to West Coast TVET College, you can visit the college’s official website at www.westcoastcollege.co.za for information on the application process. On the website, you will find information on the application requirements, admission procedures, and the programs and courses offered by the college.

How much GPA is a pass?

Usually, a GPA of 3.0 – 3.5 is considered good enough at many high schools, colleges, and universities. Top academic institutions usually require GPAs higher than 3.5.
